verses.text: And the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w spake|strong="H1696"\w* unto \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*,

\w Speak|strong="H1696"\w* unto the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, and \w say|strong="H0559"\w* unto them, When a \w man|strong="H0376"\w* shall make a \w singular|strong="H6381"\w* \w vow|strong="H5088"\w*, the \w persons|strong="H5315"\w* \add shall be\add* for the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* by thy \w estimation|strong="H6187"\w*.

And thy \w estimation|strong="H6187"\w* shall be of the \w male|strong="H2145"\w* from \w twenty|strong="H6242"\w* \w years|strong="H8141"\w* \w old|strong="H1121"\w* even unto \w sixty|strong="H8346"\w* \w years|strong="H8141"\w* \w old|strong="H1121"\w*, even thy \w estimation|strong="H6187"\w* shall be \w fifty|strong="H2572"\w* \w shekels|strong="H8255"\w* of \w silver|strong="H3701"\w*, after the \w shekel|strong="H8255"\w* of the \w sanctuary|strong="H6944"\w*.
And if it \add be\add* a \w female|strong="H5347"\w*, then thy \w estimation|strong="H6187"\w* shall be \w thirty|strong="H7970"\w* \w shekels|strong="H8255"\w*.

And if \add it be\add* from \w five|strong="H2568"\w* \w years|strong="H8141"\w* \w old|strong="H1121"\w* even unto \w twenty|strong="H6242"\w* \w years|strong="H8141"\w* \w old|strong="H1121"\w*, then thy \w estimation|strong="H6187"\w* shall be of the \w male|strong="H2145"\w* \w twenty|strong="H6242"\w* \w shekels|strong="H8255"\w*, and for the \w female|strong="H5347"\w* \w ten|strong="H6235"\w* \w shekels|strong="H8255"\w*.

And if \add it be\add* from a \w month|strong="H2320"\w* \w old|strong="H1121"\w* even unto \w five|strong="H2568"\w* \w years|strong="H8141"\w* \w old|strong="H1121"\w*, then thy \w estimation|strong="H6187"\w* shall be of the \w male|strong="H2145"\w* \w five|strong="H2568"\w* \w shekels|strong="H8255"\w* of \w silver|strong="H3701"\w*, and for the \w female|strong="H5347"\w* thy \w estimation|strong="H6187"\w* \add shall be\add* \w three|strong="H7969"\w* \w shekels|strong="H8255"\w* of \w silver|strong="H3701"\w*.

And if \add it be\add* from \w sixty|strong="H8346"\w* \w years|strong="H8141"\w* \w old|strong="H1121"\w* and \w above|strong="H4605"\w*; if \add it be\add* a \w male|strong="H2145"\w*, then thy \w estimation|strong="H6187"\w* shall be \w fifteen|strong="H2568"\w* \w shekels|strong="H8255"\w*, and for the \w female|strong="H5347"\w* \w ten|strong="H6235"\w* \w shekels|strong="H8255"\w*.

But if he be \w poorer|strong="H4134"\w* than thy \w estimation|strong="H6187"\w*, then he shall \w present|strong="H5975"\w* himself \w before|strong="H6440"\w* the \w priest|strong="H3548"\w*, and the \w priest|strong="H3548"\w* shall \w value|strong="H6186"\w* him; according \w to|strong="H6310"\w* his \w ability|strong="H3027"\w* that \w vowed|strong="H5087"\w* shall the \w priest|strong="H3548"\w* \w value|strong="H6186"\w* him.

And if \add it be\add* a \w beast|strong="H0929"\w*, whereof men \w bring|strong="H7126"\w* an \w offering|strong="H7133"\w* unto the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*, all that \add any man\add* \w giveth|strong="H5414"\w* of such unto the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* shall be \w holy|strong="H6944"\w*.

He shall not \w alter|strong="H2498"\w* it, nor \w change|strong="H4171"\w* it, a \w good|strong="H2896"\w* for a \w bad|strong="H7451"\w*, or a \w bad|strong="H7451"\w* for a \w good|strong="H2896"\w*: and if he shall at \w all|strong="H4171"\w* \w change|strong="H4171"\w* \w beast|strong="H0929"\w* for \w beast|strong="H0929"\w*, then it and the \w exchange|strong="H8545"\w* thereof shall be \w holy|strong="H6944"\w*.

And if \add it be\add* any \w unclean|strong="H2931"\w* \w beast|strong="H0929"\w*, of which they do not \w offer|strong="H7126"\w* a \w sacrifice|strong="H7133"\w* unto the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, then he shall \w present|strong="H5975"\w* the \w beast|strong="H0929"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* the \w priest|strong="H3548"\w*:

And the \w priest|strong="H3548"\w* shall \w value|strong="H6186"\w* it, \w whether|strong="H0996"\w* it be \w good|strong="H2896"\w* \w or|strong="H0996"\w* \w bad|strong="H7451"\w*: as thou \w valuest|strong="H6187"\w* it, \add who art\add* the \w priest|strong="H3548"\w*, so shall it be.\f + \fr 27.12 \ft as…: Heb. according to thy estimation, O priest, etc\f*

But if he will at \w all|strong="H1350"\w* \w redeem|strong="H1350"\w* it, then he shall \w add|strong="H3254"\w* a \w fifth|strong="H2549"\w* \add part\add* thereof unto thy \w estimation|strong="H6187"\w*.

¶ And when a \w man|strong="H0376"\w* shall \w sanctify|strong="H6942"\w* his \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \add to be\add* \w holy|strong="H6944"\w* unto the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, then the \w priest|strong="H3548"\w* shall \w estimate|strong="H6186"\w* it, whether it be \w good|strong="H2896"\w* or \w bad|strong="H7451"\w*: as the \w priest|strong="H3548"\w* shall \w estimate|strong="H6186"\w* it, so shall it \w stand|strong="H6965"\w*.

And if he that \w sanctified|strong="H6942"\w* it will \w redeem|strong="H1350"\w* his \w house|strong="H1004"\w*, then he shall \w add|strong="H3254"\w* the \w fifth|strong="H2549"\w* \add part\add* of the \w money|strong="H3701"\w* of thy \w estimation|strong="H6187"\w* unto it, and it shall be his.

And if a \w man|strong="H0376"\w* shall \w sanctify|strong="H6942"\w* unto the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \add some part\add* of a \w field|strong="H7704"\w* of his \w possession|strong="H0272"\w*, then thy \w estimation|strong="H6187"\w* shall be \w according|strong="H6310"\w* to the \w seed|strong="H2233"\w* thereof: an \w homer|strong="H2563"\w* of \w barley|strong="H8184"\w* \w seed|strong="H2233"\w* \add shall be valued\add* at \w fifty|strong="H2572"\w* \w shekels|strong="H8255"\w* of \w silver|strong="H3701"\w*.\f + \fr 27.16 \ft an…: or, the land of an homer, etc\f*

If he \w sanctify|strong="H6942"\w* his \w field|strong="H7704"\w* from the \w year|strong="H8141"\w* of \w jubile|strong="H3104"\w*, according to thy \w estimation|strong="H6187"\w* it shall \w stand|strong="H6965"\w*.

But if he \w sanctify|strong="H6942"\w* his \w field|strong="H7704"\w* \w after|strong="H0310"\w* the \w jubile|strong="H3104"\w*, then the \w priest|strong="H3548"\w* shall \w reckon|strong="H2803"\w* unto him the \w money|strong="H3701"\w* according \w to|strong="H6310"\w* the \w years|strong="H8141"\w* that \w remain|strong="H3498"\w*, even unto the \w year|strong="H8141"\w* of the \w jubile|strong="H3104"\w*, and it shall be \w abated|strong="H1639"\w* from thy \w estimation|strong="H6187"\w*.

And if he that \w sanctified|strong="H6942"\w* the \w field|strong="H7704"\w* will in any \w wise|strong="H1350"\w* \w redeem|strong="H1350"\w* it, then he shall \w add|strong="H3254"\w* the \w fifth|strong="H2549"\w* \add part\add* of the \w money|strong="H3701"\w* of thy \w estimation|strong="H6187"\w* unto it, and it shall be \w assured|strong="H6965"\w* to him.

And if he will not \w redeem|strong="H1350"\w* the \w field|strong="H7704"\w*, or if he have \w sold|strong="H4376"\w* the \w field|strong="H7704"\w* to \w another|strong="H0312"\w* \w man|strong="H0376"\w*, it shall not be \w redeemed|strong="H1350"\w* any more.

But the \w field|strong="H7704"\w*, when it goeth \w out|strong="H3318"\w* in the \w jubile|strong="H3104"\w*, shall be \w holy|strong="H6944"\w* unto the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, as a \w field|strong="H7704"\w* \w devoted|strong="H2764"\w*; the \w possession|strong="H0272"\w* thereof shall be the \w priest’s|strong="H3548"\w*.

And if \add a man\add* \w sanctify|strong="H6942"\w* unto the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* a \w field|strong="H7704"\w* which he hath \w bought|strong="H4736"\w*, which \add is\add* not of the \w fields|strong="H7704"\w* of his \w possession|strong="H0272"\w*;

Then the \w priest|strong="H3548"\w* shall \w reckon|strong="H2803"\w* unto him the \w worth|strong="H4373"\w* of thy \w estimation|strong="H6187"\w*, \add even\add* unto the \w year|strong="H8141"\w* of the \w jubile|strong="H3104"\w*: and he shall \w give|strong="H5414"\w* thine \w estimation|strong="H6187"\w* in that \w day|strong="H3117"\w*, \add as\add* a holy \w thing|strong="H6944"\w* unto the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*.

In the \w year|strong="H8141"\w* of the \w jubile|strong="H3104"\w* the \w field|strong="H7704"\w* shall \w return|strong="H7725"\w* unto him of whom it was \w bought|strong="H7069"\w*, \add even\add* to him to whom the \w possession|strong="H0272"\w* of the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* \add did belong\add*.

And all thy \w estimations|strong="H6187"\w* shall be according to the \w shekel|strong="H8255"\w* of the \w sanctuary|strong="H6944"\w*: \w twenty|strong="H6242"\w* \w gerahs|strong="H1626"\w* shall be the \w shekel|strong="H8255"\w*.

¶ Only the \w firstling|strong="H1060"\w* of the \w beasts|strong="H0929"\w*, which should be the 
d \+w LORD’s|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* \w firstling|strong="H1069"\w*, no \w man|strong="H0376"\w* shall \w sanctify|strong="H6942"\w* it; whether \add it be\add* \w ox|strong="H7794"\w*, or \w sheep|strong="H7716"\w*: it \add is\add* the 
d \+w LORD’s|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*.  +  r 27.26  t firstling of: Heb. firstborn, etc *

And if \add it be\add* of an \w unclean|strong="H2931"\w* \w beast|strong="H0929"\w*, then he shall \w redeem|strong="H6299"\w* \add it\add* according to thine \w estimation|strong="H6187"\w*, and shall \w add|strong="H3254"\w* a \w fifth|strong="H2549"\w* \add part\add* of it thereto: or if it be not \w redeemed|strong="H1350"\w*, then it shall be \w sold|strong="H4376"\w* according to thy \w estimation|strong="H6187"\w*.

Notwithstanding no devoted \w thing|strong="H2764"\w*, that a \w man|strong="H0376"\w* shall \w devote|strong="H2763"\w* unto the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* of all that he hath, \add both\add* of \w man|strong="H0120"\w* and \w beast|strong="H0929"\w*, and of the \w field|strong="H7704"\w* of his \w possession|strong="H0272"\w*, shall be \w sold|strong="H4376"\w* or \w redeemed|strong="H1350"\w*: every devoted \w thing|strong="H2764"\w* \add is\add* \w most|strong="H6944"\w* \w holy|strong="H6944"\w* unto the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*.

None \w devoted|strong="H2764"\w*, which shall \w be|strong="H3808"\w* \w devoted|strong="H2763"\w* of \w men|strong="H0120"\w*, shall be \w redeemed|strong="H6299"\w*; \add but\add* shall \w surely|strong="H4191"\w* be put to \w death|strong="H4191"\w*.

And all the \w tithe|strong="H4643"\w* of the \w land|strong="H0776"\w*, \add whether\add* of the \w seed|strong="H2233"\w* of the \w land|strong="H0776"\w*, \add or\add* of the \w fruit|strong="H6529"\w* of the \w tree|strong="H6086"\w*, \add is\add* the 
d \+w LORD’s|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*: \add it is\add* \w holy|strong="H6944"\w* unto the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*.

And if a \w man|strong="H0376"\w* will at \w all|strong="H1350"\w* \w redeem|strong="H1350"\w* \add ought\add* of his \w tithes|strong="H4643"\w*, he shall \w add|strong="H3254"\w* thereto the \w fifth|strong="H2549"\w* \add part\add* thereof.

And concerning the \w tithe|strong="H4643"\w* of the \w herd|strong="H1241"\w*, or of the \w flock|strong="H6629"\w*, \add even\add* of whatsoever \w passeth|strong="H5674"\w* under the \w rod|strong="H7626"\w*, the \w tenth|strong="H6224"\w* shall be \w holy|strong="H6944"\w* unto the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*.

He shall not \w search|strong="H1239"\w* whether it be \w good|strong="H2896"\w* or \w bad|strong="H7451"\w*, neither shall he \w change|strong="H4171"\w* it: and if he \w change|strong="H4171"\w* it at \w all|strong="H4171"\w*, then both it and the \w change|strong="H8545"\w* thereof shall be \w holy|strong="H6944"\w*; it shall not be \w redeemed|strong="H1350"\w*.

These \add are\add* the \w commandments|strong="H4687"\w*, which the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w commanded|strong="H6680"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* for the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* in \w mount|strong="H2022"\w* \w Sinai|strong="H5514"\w*.
